tssurah: import { TYPE } from '../types/islam';export const surah_88: TYPE = {ayah_1: {image: '',text: 'Has there reached you the report of the Overwhelming [event]?',verse: 5837,},ayah_2: {image: '',text: '[Some] faces, that Day, will be humbled,',verse: 5838,},ayah_3: {image: '',text: 'Working [hard] and exhausted.',verse: 5839,},ayah_4: {image: '',text: 'They will [enter to] burn in an intensely hot Fire.',verse: 5840,},ayah_5: {image: '',text: 'They will be given drink from a boiling spring.',verse: 5841,},ayah_6: {image: '',text: 'For them there will be no food except from a poisonous, thorny plant',verse: 5842,},ayah_7: {image: '',text: 'Which neither nourishes nor avails against hunger.',verse: 5843,},ayah_8: {image: '',text: '[Other] faces, that Day, will show pleasure.',verse: 5844,},ayah_9: {image: '',text: 'With their effort [they are] satisfied',verse: 5845,},ayah_10: {image: '',text: 'In an elevated garden,',verse: 5846,},ayah_11: {image: '',text: 'Wherein they will hear no unsuitable speech.',verse: 5847,},ayah_12: {image: '',text: 'Within it is a flowing spring.',verse: 5848,},ayah_13: {image: '',text: 'Within it are couches raised high',verse: 5849,},ayah_14: {image: '',text: 'And cups put in place',verse: 5850,},ayah_15: {image: '',text: 'And cushions lined up',verse: 5851,},ayah_16: {image: '',text: 'And carpets spread around.',verse: 5852,},ayah_17: {image: '',text: 'Then do they not look at the camels -  how they are created?',verse: 5853,},ayah_18: {image: '',text: 'And at the sky -  how it is raised?',verse: 5854,},ayah_19: {image: '',text: 'And at the mountains -  how they are erected?',verse: 5855,},ayah_20: {image: '',text: 'And at the earth -  how it is spread out?',verse: 5856,},ayah_21: {image: '',text: 'So remind, [O Muhammad]; you are only a reminder.',verse: 5857,},ayah_22: {image: '',text: 'You are not over them a controller.',verse: 5858,},ayah_23: {image: '',text: 'However, he who turns away and disbelieves -',verse: 5859,},ayah_24: {image: '',text: 'Then Allah will punish him with the greatest punishment.',verse: 5860,},ayah_25: {image: '',text: 'Indeed, to Us is their return.',verse: 5861,},ayah_26: {image: '',text: 'Then indeed, upon Us is their account.',verse: 5862,},name: surah_88,};
